chat_template: {% set user_tag = '<|startoftext|>' %}{% set user_end = '<|extra_0|>' %}{% set system_tag = '<|startoftext|>' %}{% set system_end = '<|extra_4|>' %}{% set assistant_tag = '' %}{% set assistant_end = '<|endoftext|>' + '<|eos|>' %}{% for message in messages %}{% if message['role'] == 'system' %}{{ system_tag + message['content'] + system_end }}{% elif message['role'] == 'user' %}{{ user_tag + message['content'] + user_end }}{% elif message['role'] == 'assistant' %}{{ assistant_tag + message['content'] + assistant_end }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
